Articles.Content: This is a very stupid question(As the Title Says) but How do I write a Status Update?

On the forums?  You can click your name in the upper right, click profile, and add an item to your feed.  I don't know a lot of people who do it though.  Personally I am interested in the KSP Forums not the KSP Facebook, but I guess to each his own.

I have the same question...

also probably kerbal network

Where specifically do I click on my profile? I don't know where the feed is. I can find the status update history, but no button to add the feed. can someone show a screenshot of where the button is? sorry.  

 

Edit: Found the option was disabled for some reason.

Edited June 11, 2017 by Cabbink
Found out why it was not working
Moving to Kerbal Network, since this is a question about the forums rather than about KSP itself.
